sentence: The leading Republicans seeking the nomination for governor incumbent Brian Kemp and challenger David Perdue are far wealthier than she is.
title: Stacey Abrams reaches millionaire status before 2nd campaign

title: Stacey Abrams' net worth over $3 million as she launches second bid for Georgia governor

sentence: Since her 2018 defeat against Republican Brian Kemp, Abrams has become a leading voting rights activist.
author: JEFF AMY
title: Once mocked for her shaky personal finances, Stacey Abrams is now a millionaire
